public class  FigInk
     extends uci.gef.FigPoly
{
          // Constructors 2
     public FigInk();
     public FigInk(int, int);

          // Methods 4
     public boolean contains(int, int);
     public void setFilled(boolean);
     public void setLineWidth(int);
     public void setRectilinear(boolean);
}

Primitive Fig to paint Ink on a LayerDiagram. Ink is like an open polygon with no fill. The main difference between FigInk and FigPoly is in the way that they are created.

See Also: FigPoly, ModeCreateFigInk
